alert.note: Alert for Hocking; Pickaway; Ross (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 03 at 6:44PM EST by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF SOUTHERN FAIRFIELD, HOCKING, SOUTHEASTERN PICKAWAY AND EAST CENTRAL ROSS COUNTIES THROUGH 730 PM EST... At 644 PM EST, strong thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 9 miles east of Ashville to 9 miles west of Mcarthur, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Lancaster, Logan, Nelsonville, Bremen, Hocking Hills State Park, Hide-A-Way Hills, Starr, Royalton, Amanda, Stoutsville, Laurelville, Murray City, Sugar Grove, Adelphi, Rushville, Tarlton, West Rushville, Fairfield County Airport, US Route 22 at State Route 159 and Ilesboro. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a sturdy building. To report hazardous weather conditions, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
